review: The included controller makes this a clear upgrade over the Chromecast, especially for Prime members.  However, the controller does sometimes "double-back", taking you out of your app instead of to the previous menu.  Some control functions are not as intuitive as they could be but this seems to change from app to app.  These seem to be very minor issues though and overall this is a great way to stream your video apps wirelessly on a budget.
